title: Sexual Harassment Female Boss: Pantyhose Sexual Torture
overview: Kudo is a new employee at a major temporary staffing company. At the Tokyo branch office where he was training, there was Sanae, the branch manager and the person in charge of training new employees. When Sanae was a new employee, she continued to be sexually harassed by her managing director, Yokaichi, and now that she is in a position, she is taking revenge on the male-dominated society of the company...
